DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Safety Efficacy Fasudil Subjects With Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis ( ALS )
DOC.detailed_description: This open label , single center clinical study placebo historical research control . 10 patient enrol study . The basic treatment riluzole , 50mg twice day . For procedure , patient take fasudil treatment 14 day ( 30mg twice day , intravenous ) . 3 month later , patient repeat fasudil treatment . All patient follow 6 month . The primary outcome decline rate ALSFRS-R . The secondary outcome survival time , endpoint time ( death , tracheotomy continuous ventilator-dependent ) , force vital capacity ( FVC ) , short form health survey ( SF-36 ) , evaluation cognitive function ( verbal fluency Frontal Behavioral Inventory Scale ) safety .
